name: Icare
description:
FRENCH

Flèches - Bouger, W - Tirer, X - Missiles, R - Recommencer, Entrée - Valider dans le menu

Vous avez 5 PVs et 3 lancers de missiles pour terminer le niveau.

ENGLISH

Arrow keys - Move, W - Fire, X - Missiles, R - Restart, Enter - Confirm menu option

You have 5 HP and 3 missile salvos available in order to finish the level.
